blogPost.title: What mistakes can leave companies susceptible to security breaches? Answer by @jedidiahyueh, Author of Disrupt or Die , Founder and CEO at Delphix. https://t.co/SLXVDji7Fy https://t.co/XaAN3mf13z
blogPost.author: Quora

localize.full_text: どのようなミスがあれば、企業はセキュリティ侵害の影響を受けやすいのでしょうか？回答者： @jedidiahyueh, Author of Disrupt or Die , Founder and CEO at Delphix. https://t.co/SLXVDji7Fy https://t.co/XaAN3mf13z
哪些错误会让公司容易受到安全漏洞的影响？回答者：@jedidiahyueh，《Disrupt or Die》作者 ，Delphix创始人兼CEO。https://t.co/SLXVDji7Fy https://t.co/XaAN3mf13z。
哪些錯誤會讓公司容易受到安全漏洞的影響？回答者：@jedidiahyueh，《Disrupt or Die》作者 ，Delphix創始人兼CEO。https://t.co/SLXVDji7Fy https://t.co/XaAN3mf13z。

previous.title: What is one thing you want to tell aspiring young authors? Answer by @joyjordanlake, Author, Adjunct professor of English lit & creative writing. https://t.co/GO2HH3UusY https://t.co/JnvurJACE6

localize.full_text: 若い作家志望の人に伝えたいことはありますか？Answer by @joyjordanlake, Author, Adjunct professor of English lit & creative writing. https://t.co/GO2HH3UusY https://t.co/JnvurJACE6
你想告诉有抱负的年轻作者一件事是什么？回答者：@joyjordanlake，作家，英语文学& 创意写作兼职教授。https://t.co/GO2HH3UusY https://t.co/JnvurJACE6。
你想告訴有抱負的年輕作者一件事是什麼？回答者：@joyjordanlake，作家，英語文學& 創意寫作兼職教授。https://t.co/GO2HH3UusY https://t.co/JnvurJACE6。

next.title: What are some tips for people who are on a tight budget but are interested in luxury fashion? Answer by Diego Abba, CEO at https://t.co/GF0Ml5Agum. https://t.co/m7CLnss0b6 https://t.co/YsdLuYoItm

localize.full_text: 予算が限られているが、高級ファッションに興味がある人のためのヒントを教えてください。Answer by Diego Abba, CEO at https://t.co/GF0Ml5Agum. https://t.co/m7CLnss0b6 https://t.co/YsdLuYoItm
对于预算紧张但又对奢侈品时尚感兴趣的人，有什么建议？回答者：Diego Abba，CEO在https://t.co/GF0Ml5Agum。https://t.co/m7CLnss0b6 https://t.co/YsdLuYoItm。
對於預算緊張但又對奢侈品時尚感興趣的人，有什麼建議？回答者：Diego Abba，CEO在https://t.co/GF0Ml5Agum。https://t.co/m7CLnss0b6 https://t.co/YsdLuYoItm。
